items.content_html: Ping Pong, or table tennis, is a fast-paced indoor sport for two or four players. Played on a rectangular table split by a net, players use paddles to hit a lightweight plastic ball back and forth. The goal is to make the ball bounce once on the opponent‚Äôs side in a way that they cannot return it, scoring points to win the game.

Played on a rectangular table split by a net, players use paddles to hit a lightweight plastic ball back and forth. The goal is to make the ball bounce once on the opponent‚Äôs side in a way that they cannot return it, scoring points to win the game.

items.content_html: A clean and minimalistic To-Do list application built with React, designed to help you manage your daily tasks with ease. The app allows users to add, edit, mark as complete, and delete tasks. This project is perfect for beginners who want to learn React basics or for anyone looking for a lightweight task management tool.
items.title: mitramansouri/to-do-app: A clean and minimalistic To-Do list application built with React, designed to help you manage your daily tasks with ease. The app allows users to add, edit, mark as complete, and delete tasks. This project is perfect for beginners who want to learn React basics or for anyone looking for a lightweight task management tool.
